page.title: 08MARFLEET LANE SHOPS, HULL
page.content: {Bit more expensive.Further along we {have 2 supermarkets which are well {stocked."--Mrs.P.French}********* ************************************** {2nd Parade (294-316) MARFLEET LANE {D Tong(294)}Newsagents.Magazines, drinks,cards.A few toys.{Gateway {Foogmarkets(296)} Supermarket.Open Mon to Sat(late Thur & Fri).Groceries, frozen food,bread{Boots(298)}Chemist (dispensing).9am-6pm.Sat 9am-1pm.{ {Co-op Butchery(300)}Butchers.Meat, eggs,pasties,sausage rolls.8am-5pm {H.Maynard & Sons(302)}Greengrocers. Fruit,veg,flowers,crisps,lemonade. {Foster & Plumpton(304)}Dispensing Chemist.Mon to Fri(9-6)Sat(9-5.30) {Houltons(306)}Repair & shoe shop (mainly repairs){Beals(308)}Post Office,Discount Toys(Action Force) sweets,jewellery,cards,cigarettes {Harold Ashton(310)}Butchers & Bakery
